name: Combined Shields
description:
Short Arcade Space Shooter esque game where you can't shoot, but are bound to another space ship and have to reflect the enemies bullets back to them!

Controls:

W/A/S/D / Arrow Keys - Movement
Mouse - Aiming your Spaceships
Space - Split Spaceships

Known Bugs/'Unwanted Features':
I polished the collision quite a lot but there might still be some glitchy physics when moving towards a bullet.
The line between the two ships drags slightly behind which I couldn't fix in time.

All Art used was by: Kenney
All Music used was from Opengameart by:

  • OBLIDIVM
  • Paolo D'Emilio
